description:
The fourth collection. This is art. This is satire.

This collection is a present for the aerly believers. UglyBots were the first NFTÂ´s I have created. Only holders of an Ugly Bot can buy one of these Renkerts for 1Mi.

This is one of the first "Art Satire" - Projects in the Cryptospace.

This "Renkert Snofla"-Collection again shows the development from the Basic Renkert Snofla without many effects to the final picture of this collection wich has lots of artefacts and effects.

7 Steps - 7 beautiful unique pictures.

Check out the details of the final version!

The way of creation is the artists secret.

This is the fourth collection of our lovely Alfons Trekner. Others will follow. Maybe.
name: Renkert Snofla - The fourth collection
